HomePage.title: Your Universal Bookmark Manager
HomePage.description: Save and organize your bookmarks with one click. Access them anywhere, anytime.

save.title: One-Click Save
save.desc: Save any webpage to your collection with a simple drag and drop installation.

categorize.title: Smart Categories
categorize.desc: Automatically categorize your bookmarks for better organization.

access.title: Access Anywhere
access.desc: Sync across devices, access your bookmarks anywhere.

share.title: Share & Collaborate
share.desc: Easily share bookmark collections and collaborate with others.
